The End of SemestR TestR is a (**fun**) quiz to check how much you've leaRnt this semester, to see what skills you're a total supeRstaR at, & to help you identify which topics to revise. The quiz covers the fundRmentals of R/RStudio & the key functions we've covered in the past semester. Your answers will be saved in your browser so you can come back to it later if you wish!
